ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Fear Crashes
ygData.msgSnippet: as far as i know of, it only crashes when cazic is pulled.....something about him...verant s working on fixing it...the exp loss is also doubled from in there
ygData.messageBody:
as far as i know of, it only crashes when cazic is pulled.....something about
him...verant's working on fixing it...the exp loss is also doubled from in there
as well....which sux if you think you have enough to sustain one death and not
lose a level then die and come to find out you lose a whole bar instead of a
half.....

Azor wrote:

> From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
> I've been reading Plane of Fear is so buggy it crashes a lot. If this is
> true then why doesn't Verant fix it instade of getting rdy to put up Plane
> of Hate? Also if this is true then why would anyone want to travel in
> there? I'd be to afraid that I'd get in there kinda far just to have it
> crash andwhen I got back on to find out that I had been killed and have to
> run the risk of going back in there to get my corpse and have the zone crash
> again.
> Has anyone of you had this problem in Plane of Fear?
>
> **************************
> Azor
> Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
